casebody.data:
Angela Meshell BLUITT
v.
WAKE FOREST UNIVERSITY BAPTIST MEDICAL CENTER, Wake Forest University, North Carolina Baptist Hospital, and Evan Rubery, MD No. 149P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Java O. Warren, Attorney at Law, for Bluitt, Angela Meshell. Christopher A. White, Attorney at Law, for Bluitt, Angela Meshell. D. Clark Smith, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Wake Forest University Baptist Medical Center, et al. Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, for Wake Forest University Baptist Medical Center, et al. Joshua O. Harper, Attorney at Law, for Wake Forest University Baptist Medical Center, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of May 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
